description: 6502bench is an industrial-strength disassembler for 6502, 65C02, and 65816 programs.
post_install: $releaseKey = Get-ItemProperty "HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\NET Framework Setup\NDP\v4\Full" -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Release
Write-Host "You must have .NET Framework v4.6.2 or later installed to run this app."
Write-Host "You must have .NET Framework v4.6.2 or later installed to run this app."
